answers.answer: I have a neighbor who is diabetic. She had to be monitored very closely during her pregnancy. Her baby boy is over a year old now. There are higher risks to you during pregnancy so make sure you're seeing a doctor consistently!

question: yo i have type one diabetes, and i am also pregnant.i have been to enough web sites.. and all they tell me is thatthere is to high of a risk of either me or my baby dyingi am 100% against abortions, which is why i kept it.but im terrified, is there any possiblle way of me have a healthy baby and life?
title: teen preggo with diabetes
